name: Scolipede
author: Oku
flavor_text: With quick movements, it chases down its foes, attacking relentlessly with its horns until it prevails.

abilities.name: Poison Point
abilities.effect: If this Pokémon is in the Active Spot and is damaged by an attack from your opponent’s Pokémon (even if this Pokémon is Knocked Out), the Attacking Pokémon is now Poisoned.

attacks.name: Venoshock
attacks.effect: If your opponent’s Active Pokémon is Poisoned, this attack does 90 more damage.
